text:
@JoeBiden #DopeyDon Thursday Implosion:

#JohnBolton Book & #MaryTrump tweets have shaken #Trump
No doubt Trump is Mentally unstable 
Is Trump a Traitor & committed treason? 
Claimed there was an AIDS Vaccine 
Lies repeatedly about #COVID19, 120K+ have died 
Pathological Liar & Narcissist
